com.github.fge.lambdas

Enum ThrowablesFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<ThrowablesFactory>
      • com.github.fge.lambdas.ThrowablesFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Comparable<ThrowablesFactory>

    public enum ThrowablesFactory
extends Enum<ThrowablesFactory>
    An "enum singleton" for building RuntimeException instances

    This factory is used to build instances of runtime exception classes which you specify using ThrowingFunctionalInterface.orThrow(Class) or ThrowingFunctionalInterface.as(Class), as in, for instance:

         final ThrowingFunction<Foo, Bar> f
         = Functions.rethrow(some::reference).as(MyException.class);

    It is thread safe and uses a simple ConcurrentHashMap to collect constructors of exception classes (as MethodHandles).

    Your exception class must have a constructor accepting a single Throwable as an argument. When the throwing lambda throws a checked exception, this factory will build an instance of your exception class and pass the checked exception as an argument to the constructor.

    In code, you will then be able to access the exception thrown originally by invoking Throwable.getCause().

    See Also:
    RuntimeException.RuntimeException(Throwable), MethodHandles.publicLookup(), MethodHandles.Lookup.findConstructor(Class, MethodType), MethodHandle.invokeExact(Object...), Map.computeIfAbsent(Object, Function)

      • get

        public <E extends RuntimeException> E get(Class<E> c,
                                          Throwable t)
        Build a new instance of a runtime exception

        If the exception cannot be built for a reason or another, this method throws an ThrowablesFactory.InstantiationException. In this exception:

        • the exception having caused the instantiation failure is set as the cause;
        • the Throwable thrown by the lambda is suppressed (use Throwable.getSuppressed() to access it).
        Type Parameters:
        E - the type of the runtime exception class
        Parameters:
        c - the runtime exception class
        t - the throwable to attach
        Returns:
        an instance of this runtime exception with the throwable passed as an argument
        Throws:
        ThrowablesFactory.InstantiationException - see description
        Error - unexpected error when building the instance
        RuntimeException - unexpected exception when building the instance
